scripts.depo: yarn build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='dist';const dest='../../';fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file);const destPath=path.join(dest,file);if(fs.existsSync(destPath)){fs.rmSync(destPath,{recursive:true,force:true});}fs.cpSync(srcPath,destPath,{recursive:true});});"
